info.title: API Evangelist - Frequently Asked Questions API
info.description: This is an frequently asked questions for helping manage the frequently asked questions details of many disparate Frequently Asked Questions. Not all APis use the same approach, and this is an attempt to organize the mess.

get.description: retrieves all frequently asked questions entries

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: your appid for accessing the API

parameters.name: appkey
parameters.description: your appkey for accessing the API

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: a text query to search across frequently asked questions entries

parameters.name: host
parameters.description: host for the frequently asked questions entry
